Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context

Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InfinitumContext
    Acts as a container for framework-wide context information.
    RestfulContext
    Container for RESTful web service configuration settings.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractContext
    Abstract implementation of InfinitumContext representing a root "parent" context.
    ContextFactory
    Provides access to an InfinitumContext singleton.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RestfulContext.MessageType
    Describes the message type to use for web-service PUT/POST requests.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.context Description

Provides the classes necessary for configuring Infinitum and providing application-wide access to configuration information.
